name: VR Puzzle Box
description:
Accept incredible brain twister challenge - try immersive VR experience that is simple, but very exciting .

Your goal is to fill up the box with various 3D shapes. How quick can you do that?

What if we also offer 3 levels of difficulty and 3 different game modes?

  • Single game mode: one random level, multiple difficulties.
  • Story mode: start with easy levels, and advance to more complex puzzles as you solve the challenges.
  • Challenge mode is required to accept a speed challenge. Pick 4 random levels for each difficulty, and try to solve them as quickly as possible.

Each game mode has it’s own leaderboard so you can compete with your friends (or just with yourself :).

We have so much coming in future releases - stay tuned!
  • More levels
  • Steam leaderboards
  • Steam achievements
  • and many more ideas baking in our minds
